scripts.deploy:avax: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ traderjoe-xyz/vejoe vejoe.avax.yaml
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ traderjoe-xyz/vejoe-rinkeby vejoe.rinkeby.yaml
scripts.deploy:fuji: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ traderjoe-xyz/vejoe-fuji vejoe.fuji.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --access-token traderjoe-xyz/vejoe vejoe.fuji.yaml
